snippet: Two biologists warily, testily, explore menstruation, menopause and other questions of female evolution in “The How and the Why,” a smart, densely textured play by Sarah Treem.
abstract: Sylviane Gold reviews Penguin Rep production of Sarah Treem play The How and the Why, directed by Joe Brancato and starring Gordana Rashovich and Olivia Horton (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: Two biologists warily, testily, explore menstruation, menopause and other questions of female evolution in “The How and the Why,” a smart, densely textured play by Sarah Treem.
